dublinCore.title: 113 S494 IS: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand the types of livestock for which bonus depreciation is available.
dublinCore.rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

form.current-chamber: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

action.action-desc: Mr. Schumerintroduced the following bill; which was read twice and referred to theCommittee on Finance

form.official-title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand the types of livestock for which bonus depreciation is available.

section.header: Expansion of livestock available for bonus depreciation

subsection.text: Subparagraph (E) of section 168(k)(2) of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986is amended by adding at the end the following new clause:

clause.text: In the case of any dairy producing calf or cow,subparagraph (A)shall be applied without regard toclause (ii) thereof.

subsection.text: The amendment made bysubsection (a)shall apply to property placed in service after December 31, 2012, in taxable years ending after such date.
